weka.dl4j.iterators

Class ConvolutionalInstancesIterator

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.dl4j.iterators.AbstractDataSetIterator
      • weka.dl4j.iterators.ConvolutionalInstancesIterator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, OptionHandler

    public class ConvolutionalInstancesIterator
extends AbstractDataSetIterator
    Converts the given Instances object into a DataSet and then constructs and returns a ShufflingDataSetIterator. This iterator is designed for training convolutional networks on data that is represented as standard WEKA instances. It enables specification of filter width and height, and number of channels.
    Version:
    $Revision: 11711 $
    Author:
    Christopher Beckham, Eibe Frank
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
